Traits.Name: Aetherwall
Traits.Description: Cover from ranged attacks outside range 2.

Actions.Name: Chant of Investiture
Actions.Description: An ally in range 8 is marked by the Cantrix and gains resistance to all damage, sturdy, and +1 boon on all attacks and saves while in range 8 of the Cantrix. While in this stance, the Cantrix reduces their speed to 0. It ends if the Cantrix is shoved or stunned.

Actions.Name: Hypnogogia
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 of the Cantrix becomes pacified. If already pacified, the character is also winded.

Actions.Name: Escape
Actions.Description: The Cantrix swaps place with its marked ally.
